parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Kedesh -- 'sanctuary', the name of several places in Israel

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Edrei -- a chief city of Bashan, also a place in Naphtali

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: En-hazor -- 'a spring of Hazor', a city in Naphtali
